archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.name: Business Principles, Objectives, & Drivers
archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.documentation:
Business Principles:
These are high-level rules or guidelines that direct how the business operates and makes decisions. They are stable, enduring, and align with the organization's core values.
Examples: • “Customer experience is the top priority.” • “We will prioritize open standards and interoperability.” • “Security and compliance must be built into all systems.” • “Business continuity must be ensured across all services.”
Purpose in Architecture Vision:
• Help evaluate architectural trade-offs. • Serve as a filter for technology choices. • Ensure alignment with corporate culture and governance.
Business Objectives:
These are specific, measurable goals the business wants to achieve. Objectives reflect the tactical execution of the business strategy.
Examples:
• “Increase customer retention by 20% within 12 months.” • “Reduce operational costs by 15% through automation.” • “Expand into three new geographic markets this year.” • “Improve on-time delivery to 98%.”
Purpose in Architecture Vision:
• Guide architecture requirements. • Help define the scope and success criteria. • Serve as input to capability gaps and value assessments.
Business Drivers:
Drivers are forces or motivations that trigger change in the organization. They can be external (market trends, regulation) or internal (growth targets, M&A, performance issues).
Examples:
• Market competition or digital disruption • Regulatory compliance (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA) • Customer demands for faster service • Need for operational efficiency • Business model transformation (e.g., from product to subscription)
Purpose in Architecture Vision:
• Justify why the architecture initiative is happening. • Help prioritize architectural focus areas. • Drive alignment between business needs and architecture planning. _______________________________________________________________________________________________
How They Fit Together in TOGAF Phase A
Element ->Description->Role in Architecture Vision:
Principles ->Timeless business rules or values->Guide decisions and constrain design Objectives->Specific outcomes the business wants->Define scope, KPIs, and success metrics Drivers ->Motivations or pressures for change ->Justify the need for architecture work
